mapper.select: select g_id, c_id, g_name, g_price, g_isdiscount, g_describe, g_sales_volume, g_buy_person_time, g_stock, g_storage_time, g_removal_time, g_status, es_1, es_2, es_3 from goods where g_id = #{gId}
select g_id, c_id, g_name, g_price, g_isdiscount, g_describe, g_sales_volume, g_buy_person_time, g_stock, g_storage_time, g_removal_time, g_status, es_1, es_2, es_3 from goods where c_id = #{cId}
mapper.insert: insert into goods(c_id, g_name, g_price, g_isdiscount, g_describe, g_sales_volume, g_buy_person_time, g_stock, g_storage_time, g_removal_time, g_status, es_1, es_2, es_3) values (#{cId}, #{gName}, #{gPrice}, #{gIsdiscount}, #{gDescribe}, #{gSalesVolume}, #{gBuyPersonTime}, #{gStock}, #{gStorageTime}, #{gRemovalTime}, #{gStatus}, #{es1}, #{es2}, #{es3})

insert into goods(c_id, g_name, g_price, g_isdiscount, g_describe, g_sales_volume, g_buy_person_time, g_stock, g_storage_time, g_removal_time, g_status, es_1, es_2, es_3) values
(#{entity.cId}, #{entity.gName}, #{entity.gPrice}, #{entity.gIsdiscount}, #{entity.gDescribe}, #{entity.gSalesVolume}, #{entity.gBuyPersonTime}, #{entity.gStock}, #{entity.gStorageTime}, #{entity.gRemovalTime}, #{entity.gStatus}, #{entity.es1}, #{entity.es2}, #{entity.es3})

insert into goods(c_id, g_name, g_price, g_isdiscount, g_describe, g_sales_volume, g_buy_person_time, g_stock, g_storage_time, g_removal_time, g_status, es_1, es_2, es_3) values
(#{entity.cId}, #{entity.gName}, #{entity.gPrice}, #{entity.gIsdiscount}, #{entity.gDescribe}, #{entity.gSalesVolume}, #{entity.gBuyPersonTime}, #{entity.gStock}, #{entity.gStorageTime}, #{entity.gRemovalTime}, #{entity.gStatus}, #{entity.es1}, #{entity.es2}, #{entity.es3})
on duplicate key update c_id = values(c_id), g_name = values(g_name), g_price = values(g_price), g_isdiscount = values(g_isdiscount), g_describe = values(g_describe), g_sales_volume = values(g_sales_volume), g_buy_person_time = values(g_buy_person_time), g_stock = values(g_stock), g_storage_time = values(g_storage_time), g_removal_time = values(g_removal_time), g_status = values(g_status), es_1 = values(es_1), es_2 = values(es_2), es_3 = values(es_3)
mapper.update:
update goods
c_id = #{cId},
g_name = #{gName},
g_price = #{gPrice},
g_isdiscount = #{gIsdiscount},
g_describe = #{gDescribe},
g_sales_volume = #{gSalesVolume},
g_buy_person_time = #{gBuyPersonTime},
g_stock = #{gStock},
g_storage_time = #{gStorageTime},
g_removal_time = #{gRemovalTime},
g_status = #{gStatus},
es_1 = #{es1},
es_2 = #{es2},
es_3 = #{es3},
where g_id = #{gId}
